task.title: Login button unresponsive on Chrome
task.description: Multiple customers report the login button does nothing when clicked in Chrome 123.

task.title: Add dark mode option to admin panel
task.description: Account manager requests a dark theme toggle for late-night usage in the admin panel.

task.title: Clarify invoice tax line items
task.description: Customer wants to understand the tax calculation on their April invoice.

task.title: Webhook retries failing for order events
task.description: Ops team sees repeated 500 errors when the order.created webhook retries after five minutes.

task.title: Typo in onboarding email
task.description: User noticed a spelling mistake in the welcome email template for new accounts.

task.title: API rate limit warning spikes
task.description: Monitoring shows API clients receiving rate limit warnings after the latest deployment.

task.title: Unable to upload profile picture
task.description: User reports uploads of JPG avatars fail with an unknown error.

task.title: Nightly backup job skipped
task.description: SRE alert indicates the nightly backup for the EU cluster did not run.

task.title: Need documentation for new API version
task.description: Partner integration team asks where to find the v3 API docs.

task.title: Delayed email digests
task.description: Marketing reports that weekly digest emails are arriving 12 hours late for multiple customers.

task.title: Update billing contact
task.description: Customer requests changing their billing contact email on file.

task.title: Reset MFA device
task.description: User lost their phone and needs the MFA device reset.

task.title: Slow dashboard load times
task.description: Customer success reports the analytics dashboard takes over 15 seconds to load since yesterday.

task.title: How to change workspace logo
task.description: Customer asks for steps to update their workspace logo.

task.title: Payment retries exhausting
task.description: Billing system shows failed retries for auto-renewal payments for several enterprise accounts.

task.title: Rename workspace
task.description: Admin wants to rename their workspace after a rebrand.

task.title: Clarify SSO prerequisites
task.description: Prospect requests details on SSO requirements before purchase.

task.title: Audit logs missing entries
task.description: Security team notes missing audit log events between 02:00 and 03:00 UTC.

task.title: Correct typo in FAQ
task.description: Support agent noticed a typo in the public FAQ page.

task.title: Service restart required after patch
task.description: Deploy notes indicate the notifications service needs a restart to pick up new configuration.

task.title: Export user list
task.description: HR requests an export of all active users for compliance review.

task.title: Mobile app crash on launch
task.description: QA reports the iOS beta crashes immediately after launch on the latest build.

task.title: Need sandbox account
task.description: Partner developer asks for a sandbox environment account to test API calls.

task.title: Regional latency increase
task.description: Monitoring shows 3x latency in APAC region for message delivery.

task.title: Update support phone number
task.description: Customer success requests updating the support phone number displayed on the help site.
